DOC.brief_summary: Trial design : - Phase III , FOLFIRI versus FOLF ( HA ) iri ( FOLFIRI regimen `` Hyaluronic acid-Irinotecan '' `` HA-Irinotecan '' ) regimen . - Patients mCRC ( metastatic colorectal cancer ) , 2nd/3rd line irinotecan naïve . - Randomized 1:1 , double-blinded , multi-centre , multi-national ( Australia , Bulgaria , Poland , Serbia , Russia , Ukraine United Kingdom ) . - Dosing regimen : - Irinotecan ( 180 mg/m2 ) HA-Irinotecan ( 180 mg/m2 ) , IV , 90 minute , day 1 ( patient > 75 year age , irinotecan HA-Irinotecan dose must reduce 150 mg/m2 ) . - Leucovorin , 400 mg/m2 , levoleucovorin , 200 mg/m2 , IV 90 minute irinotecan . - 5-fluorouracil ( 5-FU ) , 400 mg/m2 IV bolus day 1 , 1200 mg/m2/day x 2 day ( total 2400 mg/m2 46-48 hour ) continuous infusion . - Repeat every 2 week 8 month . - Patient accrual approximately 12-14 month . - Monitoring 18 month post-randomization . - 390 patient . - Progression Free Survival ( PFS ) primary endpoint . - Safety analysis initial 20 patient .
DOC.brief_title: Trial FOLF ( HA ) Iri Versus FOLFIRI mCRC
